folksonomy.title: Folksonomy Engine
folksonomy.subtitle: Keys Explorer
folksonomy.description: Folksonomy allows users to add custom tags to products. Browse all available keys below, search for specific keys, or click on any key to see products that use it.

home.intro_1: OpenFoodFacts Explorer is a tool to explore the OpenFoodFacts database.
home.intro_2: You can enter a product code in the search bar above to get started or click on one of the products below.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Failed to connect to the Open Food Facts server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
network.instructions: If the problem persists, visit the Open Food Facts Status Page.
